Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Beach Rotana Abu Dhabi, you'll be centrally located in Abu Dhabi, steps from Abu Dhabi Mall and minutes from Khalifa Center. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of The Galleria and Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 565 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day at the private beach, you can enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and outdoor tennis courts. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and supervised childcare/activities.

Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

With a stay at Beach Rotana Abu Dhabi, you'll be centrally located in Abu Dhabi, steps from Abu Dhabi Mall and minutes from Khalifa Center. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of The Galleria and Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Abu Dhabi Mall - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Khalifa Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
The Galleria - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Capital Garden - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Zayed City Market - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Fish Market - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
The Corniche - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Red Crescent Authority - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Port Zayed - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Mina Mall - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Al Wahda Mall - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Al Wahda Club - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Al Hosn University - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Cultural Foundation - 3 km / 1.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 27.6 km / 17.2 mi

The preferred airport for Beach Rotana Abu Dhabi is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Beach Rotana Abu Dhabi are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 27.1 km / 16.8 mi

The preferred airport for Beach Rotana Abu Dhabi is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 20/Jul/2016 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: The below notice is no longer valid and the beach is open as normal and swimming at the beach is allowed. With immediate effect, per the recommendation of the Environment Agency of Abu Dhabi, swimming at the beach will not be allowed until further notice. All other recreational facilities such as the swimming pool, spa and jacuzzis are available for use at the hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Compulsory Tourism Dirham Fee of 15 AED to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night. During the Holy month of RAMADAN, restrictions may apply for the operation of the restaurant and bars of the hotel as per U.A.E Law. Check with the hotel for further info.
